= Vue Router
:url-website: https://router.vuejs.org/
:url-repo: https://github.com/vuejs/router

{url-website}[[website\]]
{url-repo}[[repo\]]

== Installation

=== CDN

[source,html]
----
<script src="https://unpkg.com/vue-router@4"></script>
----

=== Node

[source,bash]
----
pnpm install vue-router@4
----
